Post: "I'm so sorry to hear that you're having a tough time with your weekends being ruined. It sounds like you're feeling really down about it, and I can understand why. It's important to remember that everyone has their own struggles, and it's okay to feel overwhelmed sometimes. Instead of turning to alcohol, have you considered finding healthy ways to cope with your feelings? Maybe you could try talking to a trusted friend or family member, engaging in a hobby you enjoy, or practicing some self-care techniques like meditation or deep breathing. Remember that you're not alone, and there are people who care about you and want to support you through tough times. Keep your head up and know that things will get better!"
